summary.span: 命名空間 (Namespace) 包含在設計階段為元件建立自訂使用者介面行為的類別。

span.span: The namespace contains classes for creating custom user interface behavior for components at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出包含於此命名空間的類別：The following list shows the classes included in this namespace: - A類別處理繪製和點擊測試。A class for handling painting and hit-testing. - 管理的集合類別物件。An class for managing a collection of objects. - A管理設計工具中的自訂使用者介面的類別。A class for managing the custom user interface in a designer. - A表示水平和垂直線段，協助使用者在設計階段對齊元件的類別。A class that represents horizontal and vertical line segments that assist users in aligning components at design time.
